titleStmt.title: The informations of Robert Jenison of Grayes Inn, Esquire relating the horrid Popish Plott, as they were given in writing upon oath to the Honourable House of Commons on Tuesday the 9th day of November, 1680.
titleStmt.author: Jenison, Robert, 1648-1688.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Thomas Basset and Richard Tonson ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
